definitions: (of a mythical animal) formed from parts of various animals

examples.text: the design is based on a chimeric creature with the body of a turtle and the head of a dragon

shortDefinitions: formed from parts of various animals

definitions: hoped for but illusory or impossible to achieve

examples.text: the notion of tolerance is a chimeric dream

shortDefinitions: hoped for but impossible to achieve

definitions: relating to or denoting an organism containing a mixture of genetically different tissues, formed by processes such as fusion of early embryos, grafting, or mutation

examples.text: the creation of chimeric mice has proven to be a valuable tool in the field of immunology

shortDefinitions: denoting organism containing mixture of genetically different tissues

definitions: relating to or denoting a DNA molecule with sequences derived from two or more different organisms, formed by laboratory manipulation

examples.text: we discovered chimeric RNAs in the tumor samples

shortDefinitions: denoting DNA molecule with sequences derived from two organisms
